channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest on SoftLayer API

item.title: PaymentMethod.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script retrieves the record data associated with the submission of a Credit Card Change Request. * If the onlyChangeNicknameFlag parameter is set to true, the nickname of the credit card will be changed * immediately without requiring approval by an agent. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/requestCreditCardChange * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Billing_Payment_Card_ChangeRequest * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once __DIR__.'/vendor/autoload.php'; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.
